definitions: in an accepting manner, without active response or resistance

examples.text: we don't have to sit passively by while others decide our fate
they will not passively accept defeat

shortDefinitions: in accepting manner, without active response or resistance

examples.text: it is passively expressed that he was “carried up.”

definitions: from a transmitter or target rather than by generating a signal

examples.text: some cell phones passively receive data from geosynchronous satellites

shortDefinitions: from transmitter or target rather than by generating signal

definitions: by making use of incident sunlight as an energy source
shortDefinitions: by making use of incident sunlight as energy source
